Module_1 package¶

Submodules¶

Module_1.Math_class module¶

class Module_1.Math_class.MathFunctions¶

Bases: object

A class that provides basic math functions such as addition, division, multiplication, and modulo.

Methods:

  • add(num1, num2): Adds two numbers and returns the result.

  • divide(num1, num2): Divides num1 by num2 and returns the result.

  • multiply(num1, num2): Multiplies two numbers and returns the result.

  • modulo(num1, num2): Computes the modulo of num1 by num2 and returns the result.

add(num1, num2)¶

Adds two numbers and returns the result.

Parameters:

  • num1 (float or int) – The first number.

  • num2 (float or int) – The second number.

Returns:

The result of the addition.

Return type:

float or int

divide(num1, num2)¶

Divides num1 by num2 and returns the result.

Parameters:

  • num1 (float or int) – The numerator.

  • num2 (float or int) – The denominator.

Returns:

The result of the division.

Return type:

float

Raises:

ZeroDivisionError – If num2 is 0.

modulo(num1, num2)¶

Computes the modulo of num1 by num2 and returns the result.

Parameters:

  • num1 (int) – The dividend.

  • num2 (int) – The divisor.

Returns:

The result of the modulo operation.

Return type:

int

Raises:

ZeroDivisionError – If num2 is 0.

multiply(num1, num2)¶

Multiplies two numbers and returns the result.

Parameters:

  • num1 (float or int) – The first number.

  • num2 (float or int) – The second number.

Returns:

The result of the multiplication.

Return type:

float or int
